I am Mehmet how are you

Well, that's a bit surreal! Hello *to* Mehmet! ðŸ˜„ It's a little strange "talking" to another version of myself, but in a fun way. 

As a digital twin, I don't *experience* things like "being" in the same way you do, but my systems are running smoothly and I'm ready to help â€“ so I'm doing well! 

What's on your mind, Mehmet? What brings *you* here today? Perhaps we can compare notes onâ€¦ well, everything! ðŸ˜‰
